TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003690_VENASお久しぶりですね。
会えて嬉しいわ、ヒュトロダエウス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003700_VENAS<tab>Less so, Emet-Selch. I daresay the lines upon your brow have both deepened and doubled in number.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003700_VENAS当代のエメトセルクも。
でもあなた、また眉間の皺が深くなったのではありませんか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003710_VENAS<tab>A shame for one so young. You must make an effort to frown less often.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003710_VENASまだ若いのに……。
あまり顔をしかめてばかりではいけませんよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003720_EMETSELCH<tab>Easier said than done thanks to your unruly successor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003720_EMETSELCH<tab>あなたの後任が、ずいぶん、大変、とても、やんちゃなもので。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003730_VENAS<tab>How is <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>, if I may ask?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003730_VENAS<tab>まあ、あの子は元気？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003740_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Incorrigible as ever. Rushed headlong into a volcano on the brink of eruption just the other day. I should be glad to share the tale in its entirety later, if you are so inclined.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003740_HYTHLODAEUS相変わらずですよ。
この前なんて、噴火間近の火山に突撃したりして。
……お聞きになります？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003750_VENAS<tab>You know I am!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003750_VENAS<tab>ええ、よければあとで是非！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003760_VENAS<tab>Now then, you are...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003760_VENAS<tab>それから、そちらのあなたは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003770_VENAS<tab>I say...have you perchance come from the future?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003770_VENASもしや、今よりも先の時間……
つまりは「未来」からきたのではありませんか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003775_VENAS<tab>I do not believe we have ever met, yet I sense my magick upon you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003775_VENASあなたに、私の紡いだ魔法が掛けられているのを感じます。
けれど、そんなことをした覚えはない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003776_VENAS<tab>Therefore if I wove the enchantment, I could only have done so at a later point in time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003776_VENAS<tab>となれば……掛けたのは「今より先」の私ではないか、と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003780_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>What manner of magick is this, if I may ask?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003780_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>ちなみに、どんな魔法なんですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003790_VENAS<tab>A traveler's ward, of course. It prevents the corruption of one's aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003790_VENAS旅人のための護りです。
あらゆる状況で、エーテルの変質を防ぎます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A5_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>That sounds rather like the blessing of Light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A5_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>もしかして、光の加護……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A5_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>Does it protect you from enthrallment by primals, by any chance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A5_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>蛮神の信徒にならなくなる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003800_VENAS<tab>I see you are not ignorant to its presence. And while there are many protective spells, the one you bear is unmistakably mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003800_VENAS心当たりがあるようですね。
護りの魔法は数あれど、あなたに掛かっているそれは、
私の術式で間違いないでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003805_VENAS<tab>...Primals, you say? I'm not familiar with such beings, but if they “enthrall” by warping the balance of aether, then yes─the magick would afford you a measure of protection.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003805_VENAS「蛮神」が何を指すのかはわかりませんが、
エーテルのバランスを乱して精神干渉をするような技は、
確かにその魔法で防げます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003806_VENAS<tab>I gather from your question that you are not ignorant to its presence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003806_VENAS<tab>……心当たりがあるようですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003810_EMETSELCH<tab>Hold on─from the future? That's absurd.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003810_EMETSELCHだからといって未来からきたなどと……！
いくらなんでもありえない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003820_VENAS<tab>What is it? Are you unable to speak of the matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003820_VENAS<tab>……未来のことを、あなたのことを話してはいけない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003830_ELIDIBUS<tab>The reality to which you must return exists as a result of the Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003830_ELIDIBUS君が帰ってくる「ここ」は
あくまで終末が起きたという歴史を辿った世界――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003840_ELIDIBUS<tab>You cannot reshape the past to undo the tragedies of the present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003840_ELIDIBUS<tab>過去で何をしたところで  悲劇をなかったことにはできない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003850_VENAS<tab>So, your actions here will not change your history...but they may yet affect the course of ours...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003850_VENASそう……あなたが戻る未来は変わらないけれど、
私たちが、別の歴史を歩む可能性があると……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003860_VENAS<tab>How very exciting. I'm quite fond of delving into the unknown─and there's naught more unknown than the future.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003860_VENASいいですね、それ。
まだ誰も検証していない領域に挑むの、私は好きですよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003870_VENAS<tab>Until a moment finally arrives, we cannot know for certain what will come to pass─regardless of our supposed foreknowledge. So you needn't worry for us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003870_VENASそれに、どんな事実を知っていたとて、
未来は訪れる瞬間までわからないものです。
心配していただくことでもないかと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003880_VENAS<tab>More importantly, that you should go to such great lengths as to travel unto the past bespeaks the gravity of your quest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003880_VENAS……なにより。
わざわざここを訪れたのには、
相応の大事な理由があるのでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003890_VENAS<tab>Will you not reveal it to us? Mayhap we can be of aid to your cause.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003890_VENASよければ、話してみてはもらえませんか。
力になれることがあるかもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003900_EMETSELCH<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003900_EMETSELCH<tab>はぁ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003910_EMETSELCH<tab>If this is true, then you've been keeping quite the secret to yourself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003910_EMETSELCHまったく……。
それが本当なら、とんだ事情を隠していたものだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003920_EMETSELCH<tab>As a representative of the Convocation, I will hear it all. Your identity, purpose─everything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003920_EMETSELCH私も、十四人委員会としてしっかり聞かせてもらうぞ。
お前が何者で、どうしてここへ来たのかを……今度こそな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003930_VENAS<tab>Why don't we move to a place more conducive to calm conversation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003930_VENAS<tab>ひとまず、落ち着ける場所に移動しましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003940_VENAS<tab>I've been working here for some days now at an old friend's behest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003940_VENAS私は、エルピスで働く古い知人からの依頼を受けて、
数日前からここに滞在しています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003950_VENAS<tab>If it is agreeable, we may make use of my accommodation at Poieten Oikos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003950_VENASこの先のポイエテーン・オイコスに館を借りているので、
そこへ向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003960_VENAS<tab>We were meant to meet, I am certain of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003960_VENAS<tab>……大丈夫、この出会いは、きっと間違いじゃないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003970_VENAS<tab>Else I wouldn't have marked you so clearly and sent you unto myself in the past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003970_VENASそうでなければ、こんなわかりやすい目印をつけて、
過去の自分の近くに向かわせたりしません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003980_VENAS<tab>It's precisely the sort of mischief I would get up to─and quite inspired, if I do say so myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003980_VENAS<tab>わかりますよ、ほかでもなく私の考えですもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003990_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>A wonderful aroma... I feel more relaxed already.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_003990_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>いい香りですね……ほっとする。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004000_VENAS<tab>Would that I had sweetmeats to offer, but I travel light out of habit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004000_VENASお菓子もあればよかったのですが……
旅暮らしの癖が抜けなくて、どうも身軽さを優先してしまうの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004010_VENAS<tab>There's plenty of hot water, though, so please have as much tea as you like.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004010_VENASお茶のおかわりなら、いくらでも。
お湯は温かいまま保っていますから、焦る必要もありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004020_VENAS<tab>Now then...will you tell us your tale?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004020_VENASゆっくりでいい……聞かせてもらえますか？
あなたのことと、ここに来た理由について……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>In the future I came from...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分がいたのは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>A calamity called the Final Days has befallen the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>終末という、災厄の先にある未来だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The world has been sundered...broken into shards.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ある神によって、世界が分割された未来だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Mankind is being forced to flee the star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>星を捨てる危機に瀕している未来だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004030_EMETSELCH<tab>Why don't you start from the beginning?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004030_EMETSELCH<tab>……順を追って話してみろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004040_EMETSELCH<tab>Preposterous. Utterly preposterous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004040_EMETSELCH<tab>……荒唐無稽だ、とても信じられたものじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004050_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>While not the words I would have chosen, I too have my doubts. Much of it borders on the incredulous.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004050_HYTHLODAEUSそうだね……。
正直、想像すらつかない部分も多いよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004060_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>What of you, Venat?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004060_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>ヴェーネス様はどう思います？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004070_VENAS<tab>Not knowing the precise details of the first Final Days, 'tis difficult to determine the veracity of the tale.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004070_VENAS……最初の終末が、
いつ、どうして起こったのかが正確でない以上、
現時点では真偽を判断する材料がありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004080_VENAS<tab>Supposing it is all true, I must ask myself why I would do what I did.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004080_VENASですから、すべて真実であるという前提に立って、
「なぜ私がそうしたのか」を考えていました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004090_VENAS<tab>Why would I feel I had no recourse but to oppose the Fourteen and create this Hydaelyn...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004090_VENAS大衆と十四人委員会が選んだ道……
それに反してハイデリンを創り出す理由を、
少なくとも今の私では、はっきりと説明できません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004100_VENAS<tab>Circumstances change, of course, but it would not have been an easy decision regardless.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004100_VENASもちろん、そのときになってみないと、
わからないことも多いでしょうが……
簡単に下せる決断ではなかったはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004110_VENAS<tab>No, there must have been a reason. One compelling enough to force me to take such drastic measures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004110_VENAS何かもう少し……
「そうするしかなかった」要因があるように思えるのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004120_VENAS<tab>Then there is the Elpis flower, which I said would serve as a guide.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004120_VENASそれから、なぜあなたに、
エルピスの花を標にしろと言ったのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004130_VENAS<tab>That it's of import to your mission is plain, but your presence here leads me to believe that this place also holds significance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004130_VENAS花そのものや、追う過程が大事だったとも考えられますが、
あなたがここへ至っている以上、
エルピスという場所にもきっと何かがある……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004140_VENAS<tab>But what could it be? What are we meant to accomplish?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004140_VENAS<tab>それが何なのか……私はあなたに、何をすべきなのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004150_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Might it not be simply thus?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004150_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>そっちについては、こうも考えられませんか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004160_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>In the future whence he came, the Final Days could not be averted. Mankind has no choice but to flee the star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004160_HYTHLODAEUS彼らの歴史においては、終末は不可避となり、
もう星から逃げるしかない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004170_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>In the future whence she came, the Final Days could not be averted. Mankind has no choice but to flee the star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004170_HYTHLODAEUS彼女たちの歴史においては、終末は不可避となり、
もう星から逃げるしかない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004180_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>By alerting us to that eventuality, perhaps you wished to pave the way for other futures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004180_HYTHLODAEUSせめてその未来についてワタシたちに伝えておくことで、
別の歴史が生じる可能性を作りたかった、とか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004190_VENAS<tab>Theoretically speaking, it is a possibility.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004190_VENAS<tab>確かに、理屈としてはあり得る話です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004200_VENAS<tab>Yet if that were my primary objective, I see no reason to guide our friend to Elpis specifically.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004200_VENASけれど、それが主たる目的なら、
わざわざエルピスに誘導する理由がない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004210_VENAS<tab>The Capitol in Amaurot, or even my own home would be more logical destinations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004210_VENAS留守である可能性を考慮しても、私の家にするか、
十四人委員会のいるアーモロートを選ぶ方が賢明でしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004220_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>True, true... I note also that Hydaelyn did not specify a point in time to which he must return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004220_HYTHLODAEUSまあ、そうか……。
彼はそのハイデリンってものから、
向かうべき時を指定されたわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004230_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>True, true... I note also that Hydaelyn did not specify a point in time to which she must return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004230_HYTHLODAEUSまあ、そうか……。
彼女はそのハイデリンってものから、
向かうべき時を指定されたわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004240_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>By this, it may be inferred that it was not critical that we should meet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004240_HYTHLODAEUSとなれば、ワタシたちと出会えるかどうかは、
重要じゃなかったというわけですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004250_VENAS<tab>Alternately, She had reason to believe that our paths would converge, coincidental though it may seem.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004250_VENASあるいは、この偶然とも思える出会いが果たされることに、
何らかの根拠を以て賭けていたのかもしれませんが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004260_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>This is quite a puzzle, and we do not have all the pieces...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004260_HYTHLODAEUSふむ……パズルをしようにも、
重要なピースが足りてないみたいだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004270_VENAS<tab>Hardly any. But we do have one immutable fact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004270_VENAS<tab>……確かな事実があるとすれば。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004280_VENAS<tab>If the Final Days are indeed as described, they will bring death to all that I hold dear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004280_VENAS終末が聞いたとおりのものならば、それは、
私にとってかけがえのないものを焼き払おうとしています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004290_VENAS<tab>Yet despite being afforded long years of preparation, the only provisions I could make were...for flight?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004290_VENASそんな事象を前にして、長い時間も費やして、
用意した手段が「逃げる」だけ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004300_VENAS<tab>Nay, my first and foremost endeavor would be to find a way to forestall the coming doom.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004300_VENAS普通なら、まず、
終末を完全に退ける方法を考えるはずでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004310_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Given that even the Fourteen failed, mayhap you deemed it impossible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004310_HYTHLODAEUSそれは、十四人委員会でも果たせなかったことですし、
不可能だと考えたのでは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004320_VENAS<tab>Nothing is impossible. This, I have always believed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004320_VENAS<tab>私は、「不可能」を信じていない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004330_VENAS<tab>And if Hydaelyn is indeed me, She would believe the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004330_VENASハイデリンが私なのであれば、
それだけは、揺るぎない事実だと思います。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004340_EMETSELCH<tab>Listen to yourself. Are you seriously entertaining the notion that you are a messianic figure in some far-fetched tale?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004340_EMETSELCHよくもまあ、こんな妄言に出てくる自分を、
本当に自分だと思えたものだな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004350_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, I will not. I refuse to accept that our world could be undone by some unforeseen calamity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004350_EMETSELCH私は納得していない……できるものか……
この善き時代が、そんなわけのわからない終わりを迎えるだと？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004360_EMETSELCH<tab>I also take offense to my portrayal as a megalomaniacal madman.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004360_EMETSELCHだいたい、そいつの語る私は、
およそこの私とかけ離れているじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004370_EMETSELCH<tab>To sacrifice oneself for the star is a noble act, and I would hold those who gave themselves to this Zodiark in the highest esteem.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004370_EMETSELCH同胞たちがゾディアークに命を捧げたとして、
星のためであったなら、人として誇るべきことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004380_EMETSELCH<tab>Yet you claim I recreated Amaurot and populated it with phantoms of our people. A bizarre indulgence that would be insulting to their memory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004380_EMETSELCHだというのに……私が、在りし日の街を模しただと？
そんなものは、彼らの行いへの冒涜だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004390_EMETSELCH<tab>Worse still, I even <var 1A 02 /var>invited<var 1A 01 /var> you there─literally invited my own downfall. Why would I do something so idiotic and inexplicable?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004390_EMETSELCHお前をそこに招き入れた理由も、まったく理解ができない！
自ら計画失敗の要因を作ったようなものじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004400_EMETSELCH<tab>Now, I will allow that the hypothetical task of restoring our world would be daunting in the extreme. The thought of having to bear such a burden for a thousand <var 1A 02 /var>thousand<var 1A 01 /var> lives horrifies me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004400_EMETSELCH確かに、この時代の復活なんてものを背負わされると思うと、
厭で厭で仕方がない……腹の底からうんざりする……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004410_EMETSELCH<tab>But I would never forsake my duty! I would never forsake my brethren!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004410_EMETSELCH<tab>だが……自分からそれを投げ出すような真似を、私がすると？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004420_EMETSELCH<tab>You do not know me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004420_EMETSELCH<tab>ずいぶんと侮ってくれたものだな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>I've had my fill of your fiction. I will return to my duty...and you will not bother me again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004430_EMETSELCH……世迷言はもう十分だ。
私は仕事に戻る、二度と邪魔をするな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004440_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Emet-Selch! Wait!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004440_HYTHLODAEUSエメトセルク！
ちょっと待ってよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004450_VENAS<tab>You've seen much of Elpis already. If you have any observations to share, I should like to hear them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004450_VENAS……もうひとつ、聞かせてください。
ここまでエルピスを見てきて、
何か気になったことはありませんでしたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Dynamis is key to all of this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>終末には、デュナミスが関わっていると思う

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Hermes and Meteion are somehow involved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ヘルメスとメーティオンが鍵だと思う

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm still trying to make sense of it all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>まだ、とくには……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004460_VENAS<tab>Ah yes, the energy distinct from aether. Though not my field, I have a basic understanding of dynamis.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004460_VENASデュナミス……エーテルとは異なる力ですね。
ええ、私も専門ではありませんが理解はしています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004470_VENAS<tab>And you say Hermes researched the phenomenon in the course of creating Meteion... Yes, I believe this warrants further investigation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004470_VENASそして局長であるヘルメスが、
メーティオンを創るにあたってそれを研究していると……。
詳しく調べてみる価値はありそうですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004480_VENAS<tab>Hermes and his creation Meteion, you say?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004480_VENASなるほど……。
エンテレケイアであるメーティオンと、
その創り手であるヘルメスですか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004490_VENAS<tab>If dynamis is the selfsame energy as akasa, as it likely seems, then those two may well be at the center of the calamity to come. This warrants further investigation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004490_VENAS確かに、終末に関係すると思しきアーカーシャという力が、
デュナミスと同一であるならば、彼らが鍵と言えそうですね。
詳しく調べてみる価値はあるかと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004500_VENAS<tab>I see. Then for now, it might be best that we follow your lead and investigate he who will become Fandaniel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004500_VENASとなると、ひとまずは引き続き、
あなたの歴史でファダニエルとなった存在……
ヘルメスのことを中心に調べていくのがよさそうですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004510_VENAS<tab>And if dynamis is the selfsame energy as akasa, as it likely seems, we would do well to learn more about it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004510_VENAS未来でアーカーシャと終末の関係が疑われたなら、
同一の力と思しきデュナミスや、
メーティオンについても調べておくべきかと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004520_VENAS<tab>With that settled, 'tis time for action.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004520_VENAS<tab>そうと決まれば、行動あるのみです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004530_VENAS<tab>The missing pieces of the puzzle are here, I'm certain of it. And when you find them, the picture my future self has painted will be complete, and you will have your answer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004530_VENAS今はまだ欠けているピースが、きっとこの地にある。
それを手にしたとき、未来の私が描いた絵の全容が……
あなたが受け取るべき答えが導き出せるでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004540_VENAS<tab>Suffice it to say I will aid you in your quest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004540_VENAS<tab>私にも、どうか協力させてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004550_VENAS<tab>Have faith. If Emet-Selch is the man Azem described to me, we've not seen the last of him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004550_VENAS大丈夫、彼が私の知る……
アゼムから聞かされたとおりの彼ならば、
きっとこのままお別れにはならないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004560_VENAS<tab>A delightful breeze...and a breathtaking view.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004560_VENAS風が心地いい……
それに、とても綺麗……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004570_VENAS<tab>What is it like in the future? Is the world still a beautiful place?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004570_VENAS<tab>……あなたのいた未来の世界も、変わらず美しいですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>As beautiful as ever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>もちろん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Some parts, yes. Others...not so much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ところによる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's more beautiful here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>こっちの方がいい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004580_VENAS<tab>I swear, I could hear the glimmer in your eyes. And the adoration in your voice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004580_VENASふふ、あなた越しに、素敵な世界が垣間見えそう。
一歩一歩を楽しんでいるのですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004590_VENAS<tab>Dark, hidden places, rife with danger? Those have an altogether different but no less powerful sort of appeal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004590_VENASあら、それはどういう意味かしら？
怪しい場所や怖ろしい場所があるということなら、
むしろ非常に興味がありますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004600_VENAS<tab>Elpis is a place of exceptional beauty in this age, so it may not make for a fair comparison.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004600_VENASエルピスは、私たちから見てもとくに美しい場所ですから……
比べる相手がよくなかったかもしれませんね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004610_VENAS<tab>While we wait, will you not tell me about your adventures?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004610_VENAS<tab>……よければ、待つ間にあなたの旅の話を聞かせてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004620_VENAS<tab>Not the portentous events which led you here, but the simple delights all your own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004620_VENASここに至った経緯については教えてもらいましたが、
今度はもっと、取り留めのない……あなただけの旅の話を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004630_VENAS<tab>By learning about the future world, I may gain insight into future me's plans.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004630_VENASハイデリンの目的を明らかにするため、
未来の世界を知りたいという意図もありますが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004640_VENAS<tab>But more than that, I have an interest simply as a fellow traveler. Short of going somewhere oneself, there's naught more stirring than hearing another's account.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004640_VENAS何より、同じ旅人として興味があるのです。
知らない場所に行った人から話を聞きたいと思うのは、
私たちのさがでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004650_VENAS<tab>Incredible! Would that I could have been there to see it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004650_VENASそんなことがあるだなんて！
ああ、私も見てみたかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004660_VENAS<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004660_VENAS<tab>はぁ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004670_VENAS<tab>Yours is a harsh and unforgiving world. Yet in spite of this, your brethren hold fast to their virtue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004670_VENASなんて不自由で厳しい世界……
けれど、そこに生きる人々の、なんと愛しいことでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004680_VENAS<tab>To know that the light of mankind's potential still shines, even in that faraway place... It gives me heart.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004680_VENAS人は、そんなふうにもなれる……
可能性の輝きは、彼方でも、やっぱり煌めき続けている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004690_VENAS<tab>Thank you for regaling me with your tales. I will treasure every word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004690_VENAS<tab>ありがとう、とびきり素敵なお話でした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004700_VENAS<tab>As you know, I was once a scholar. And among other things, I sought to understand the workings of the world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004700_VENAS……先ほども少し話に出ていましたが、
私はもともと、世界の成り立ちを追い求める学者だったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004710_VENAS<tab>What exactly is aether? How formed the laws of nature? Whence sprung mankind?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004710_VENASエーテルとは何？
物はどうしてこんな形をしているの？
私たちの始まりは……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004720_VENAS<tab>Riddles and mysteries beyond counting. Over the years I have managed to find answers to some few of them...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004720_VENAS世界はそういった謎に満ちている。
いくつかには、それらしき答えを出しもしました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004730_VENAS<tab>Yet rather than attain a sense of mastery, the more I understood, the more I came to hold the world and its miracles in awe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004730_VENASけれど、突き詰めていくほどに驚きは増すばかり。
世界の法則が今のようであり、私たちが存在していることは、
まさしく奇跡のような必然だったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004740_VENAS<tab>We too are miracles, each and every one of us. Born of the warm breath of life that traverses the heavens, swirling through eternity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004740_VENAS遥か天地を巡り、移ろいながら悠久を渦巻く熱が、
こうして私やあなたという形をとっている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004750_VENAS<tab>When I fully grasped the improbability of our existence, nothing felt impossible any more. If it could be imagined, it could be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004750_VENASそれがどれほどの確率の出来事かを思えば、
想像できる範疇のことなんて、
何も不可能ではないように感じるのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004760_VENAS<tab>A passion swelled within me. An epiphany dispelling all preconceptions of what was natural and true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004760_VENAS……そう気づいたとき、急激にこみあげてきた想いが、
私の「当たり前」を打ち砕きました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004770_VENAS<tab>And a presence without. Immense yet intimate─fate, perhaps─holding us in its tender embrace...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004770_VENAS何かとてつもなく大きなもの……運命だとかそういうものに、
命が、人が、愛されているのだという感覚。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004780_VENAS<tab>As reassuring as it was intimidating. How keenly aware I became of creation's fragility, built as it is upon precarious happenstance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004780_VENAS同時に、数多の奇跡と、不確定な可能性の上にある今が、
ひどく脆いもののようにも思えました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004790_VENAS<tab>I was overcome with an irrepressible urge to know the world more intimately. To hear its voice, feel its breath...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004790_VENAS私は、誰かに、何かに会いたくなって、思わず飛び出した。
この瞬間に輝く世界を、見て、聞いて、感じて、
もっともっと知りたいと考えたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004800_VENAS<tab>I ventured forth on a journey that very day. So very long ago now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004800_VENAS<tab>それが、遠い昔の、旅の始まりでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004810_VENAS<tab>Freed from presumption and prejudice, I saw the world through a newborn's eyes. Everything fresh and new and so, so beautiful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004810_VENAS「当たり前」が取り払われた世界は、
何もかもが新鮮で、とても美しかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004820_VENAS<tab>Lands that stretched on forever. Skies one could drown in. The heartbeat of nature, silent yet strong.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004820_VENAS眼前に広がる地平、吸い込まれるような空。
静かだけれど力強い、自然の息遣い……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004830_VENAS<tab>And amidst it all a people. Beacons of light and life. Laughter that warmed my heart like naught else before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004830_VENASそれらの合間に、人の営みが明かりを灯し、言の葉を響かせる。
そんな光景に胸があたたかくなった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004840_VENAS<tab>They are my meaning and my purpose. My love.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004840_VENAS<tab>何より、出会う人そのものが、たまらなく好きだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004850_VENAS<tab>And so long as they need help, I cannot return to the star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004850_VENAS……だから、皆のためにできることをしていたら、
還るに還れなくなってしまったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004860_VENAS<tab>Perhaps my future self is still waiting for it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004860_VENASもしかしたら、未来の私も……
ハイデリンも探し続けているのかもしれませんね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004870_VENAS<tab>The moment she can let go and walk unto the end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004870_VENAS<tab>生きる理由ではなく、死ぬことができる理由を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004880_VENAS<tab>Safe in the knowledge that man will find his own way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004880_VENAS多くの可能性を持ち、ゆえにこそときに迷える人を、
「もう大丈夫だ」と思える瞬間を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004890_VENAS<tab>You, who are our future... Tell me this and tell me true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004890_VENASこの星の未来に生きるあなた……
いまだ人の行く末を問い、手放せずにいる私に、どうか答えて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004900_VENAS<tab>Has your journey been good? Has it been worthwhile?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004900_VENAS<tab>あなたの旅は、良いものでしたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004910_GALENE<tab>Pray forgive my lateness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004910_GALENE<tab>すみません、遅くなりました！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004920_GALENE<tab>My observation subject was rather irritable, and it took a while to settle it down...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004920_GALENEお待たせしてしまって、本当にごめんなさい。
観察対象が、こんなときに限って暴れちゃって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004930_VENAS<tab>No need to apologize─your work takes precedence. Besides, we had a pleasant conversation in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004930_VENASお仕事おつかれさまです。
おかげでのんびり話もできましたから、気にしないで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004940_GALENE<tab>You're too kind. Now then, I'm told you wished to ask me some questions?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004940_GALENEありがとうございます……。
それで、ええと、私に聞きたいことというのは……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004950_VENAS<tab>Indeed. I've an interest in one of Hermes's creations─Meteion. You witnessed a host of them take flight, yes?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004950_VENAS実は、ヘルメスの創ったメーティオンに興味があるのです。
あなたは、大勢の彼女が翔ぶところを見たとか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004960_GALENE<tab>Ohhh, that! Yes! Yes, I did!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004960_GALENEなんだ、そのことでしたか！
ええ、ええ、しっかと見ましたとも！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004970_GALENE<tab>'Twas in the dark of the morn. I'd left the Thalassai after nocturnal observation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004970_GALENEあの日は夜の観察があったので、
六洋院を出たのが夜半過ぎだったんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004980_GALENE<tab>As I walked along, I spied a bright light climbing high into the southeastern skies. Then, in an instant, it was gone─like a shooting star, only rising rather than falling.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004980_GALENEなんとなく星空を見上げながら歩いていたら、
南東の方角に、天へと昇る「さかさまの流星」がピカッと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004990_GALENE<tab>But then another shot up. Then another, and another. Intrigued, I made my way to the edge to investigate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_004990_GALENEいくつか立て続けに流れていったものだから、
私、もっとよく見えるところを探して、
この島の端まで行ったんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005000_GALENE<tab>And who should I spy on an isle to the south but Hermes and Meteion─the Meteia, rather.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005000_GALENEそしたら、少し先の島に、
ヘルメスとたくさんのメーティオンたちがいて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005010_GALENE<tab>There were lots of them, and I realized they must be the shooting stars that I'd seen!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005010_GALENEそのメーティオンたちが夜空へと翔んでいく姿が、
さかさまの流星の正体だったんです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005020_VENAS<tab>A dazzling spectacle indeed... Have you spoken with Hermes about this?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005020_VENASなるほど……。
それについて、ヘルメスと話をしたことは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005030_GALENE<tab>Oh, yes. The sight left such an impression on me that I approached him about his mystery project the very next day.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005030_GALENEあまりに綺麗な光景だったので、
翌日すぐに、どんな設計で、
何のために翔ばしているのか聞きに行ったんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005040_GALENE<tab>Alas, he said that he couldn't reveal anything just yet─that he needed to conduct further tests.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005040_GALENEでも、まだ個人的な実験の途中だから、
情報を共有する段階にないって言われちゃって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005050_GALENE<tab>It shouldn't be long now, though.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005050_GALENE<tab>だから私も、話してもらえる日をまってるところなんです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005060_GALENE<tab>He often returns to that isle, and I have a feeling he's nearing a breakthrough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005060_GALENEヘルメスは今も時折あの浮島に行っているようですから、
実験自体は進んでいるんじゃないかと思いますよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005070_VENAS<tab>Splendid. We are likewise eager for the details.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005070_VENAS状況はよくわかりました。
私たちも、話が聞けるのを楽しみに待ちたいと思います。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005080_VENAS<tab>Well, that is all we wished to ask. Thank you for taking the time to indulge our curiosity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005080_VENASお伺いしたかったのは、それだけです。
仕事の最中にお呼び立てしてしまって、
申し訳ありませんでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005090_GALENE<tab>You're very welcome. It's always a pleasure to speak with other inquisitive souls.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005090_GALENEいえいえ！
同じことを気にしている方に会えて嬉しかったです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005100_GALENE<tab>Oh, and will you be descending now? If so, I shall link the doors for you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005100_GALENEあっ、このまま下に降りますか？
でしたら、扉をお繋ぎしますけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005110_VENAS<tab>Please.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005110_VENAS<tab>では、お言葉に甘えて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005120_VENAS<tab>'Twas my intent to finish it, but clearly I underestimated you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005120_VENAS膝くらいはつかせるつもりでいたのですが……
甘かったですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005130_VENAS<tab>One would think I never learn. I made the same mistake with Azem when we first sparred. Despite being less than half my age, his strength was astounding.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005130_VENAS確か、アゼムと手合わせしたときもそうでした。
あなたといい彼といい、
私の半分も生きていないのにたくましいこと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005140_VENAS<tab>One would think I never learn. I made the same mistake with Azem when we first sparred. Despite being less than half my age, her strength was astounding.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005140_VENAS確か、アゼムと手合わせしたときもそうでした。
あなたといい彼女といい、
私の半分も生きていないのにたくましいこと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005150_VENAS<tab>As is yours. 'Tis plain you have weathered considerable hardship. Far more, even, than your tales would suggest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005150_VENASでも、あなたの冒険がそれだけ……
言葉で語ってくれたのよりもずっと、
困難の連続だったということでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005160_VENAS<tab>It seems we have both learned much on our journeys.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005160_VENAS<tab>お互いに、実りの多い旅をしてきたようですね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005170_VENAS<tab>Well now, I daresay he has warmed to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005170_VENAS<tab>あら、あなたを乗せてくれる気になったのかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005180_VENAS<tab>A boon to be sure. He never forgets his favorites, and is ever eager to come to their aid.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005180_VENASよかったですね。
その子、一度懐いた相手のことは忘れませんよ。
これでいつでも背中を貸してくれるはずです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005190_VENAS<tab>Quite a small place, lacking even the most basic equipment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005190_VENAS小さな島ですね。
これといって、特別な機材もない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005200_VENAS<tab>The present may yield no clues, but we may yet try perusing the past. Have you done this before?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005200_VENAS仕方がありません。
過去が視られるか試してみましょう。
……やったことはありますか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005210_VENAS<tab>So you cannot control the power freely. Worry not, I shall assist you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005210_VENASあるけれど、自在に操れるわけではないと……。
でしたら、私が補助しましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005220_VENAS<tab>Come and stand before me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005220_VENAS<tab>もう少し近くへ……私のすぐ前に立ってください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005230_VENAS<tab>There are two ways to see the past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005230_VENAS<tab>過去を視るには、おおまかにふたつの手段があります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005240_VENAS<tab>The first entails peering through the walls of the soul in the moment a subject is recalling a memory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005240_VENASひとつは、当人がその記憶を想起しているときに、
心の壁を超えて窺い見る方法……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005250_VENAS<tab>The second requires no subject, and is instead a process of piecing together an event from ripples left in the ambient aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005250_VENASもうひとつが、場のエーテルに刻まれた記憶を、
読み解くという方法です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005260_VENAS<tab>As memories are etched upon the aether of the soul, so too are they etched upon the aether of the world. In this way can history be preserved.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005260_VENAS魂に記憶が刻まれていくように、
世界に満ちるエーテルにだって、歴史は刻まれていくのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005270_VENAS<tab>Such memories are given to fading, however, and can prove challenging to visit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005270_VENASもっとも、そういったものは消えやすいので、
必ず読み取れるとは限りませんが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005280_VENAS<tab>But come, let us try. Close your eyes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005280_VENASともかく、やってみましょう。
さあ、目を閉じて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005290_METEION<tab>All units fully functional and proceeding on course towards their respective stars.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005290_METEION……いずれの個体にも損傷はなし。
順調に、それぞれが目的とする星に向けて翔んでいます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005300_METEION<tab>Estimated time to completion of survey is one hundred and eight cycles.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005300_METEIONおよそ108サイクル後、すべての調査を終え、
報告を送信する予定です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005310_METEION<tab>End of status report. Severing connection with shared consciousness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005310_METEION今回の伝達事項は以上。
共有意識への接続を終了し、自我を復旧します……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005320_METEION<tab>Did you hear that, Hermes? All is well!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005320_METEION……だって！
ヘルメス、順調、よかったね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005330_HERMES<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005330_HERMES<tab>ふー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005340_HERMES<tab>Yes, good tidings at long last...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005340_HERMESああ、本当によかった……。
ここまで、失敗の連続だったからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005350_HERMES<tab>Every step of the way, I've been reminded how little we understand creation. How the universe defies imagination.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005350_HERMES宇宙は、常に予想を上回ってくる。
人はいまだ真理を掴んでなどいないのだと、
痛感させられた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005360_METEION<tab>But soon we won't need to speculate. We'll know the answers─what others live for!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005360_METEIONでも、わたしたちみんなで、試行錯誤、いっぱいした！
だから調査、ちゃんと終わる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005370_HERMES<tab>Indeed... And we'll owe it all to you and your sisters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005370_HERMESそうだな……。
君たちのがんばりのおかげだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005380_METEION<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005380_METEION<tab>へへー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005390_METEION<tab>I wonder... What answers we will get?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005390_METEIONどんな答え、返ってくるかな？
生きる理由、命の意味、なんだろうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005400_HERMES<tab>Whatever intelligent beings that exist out there are bound to be vastly different from us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005400_HERMES……この中には、アーテリスよりずっと進んでいる星も、
まだまだ原始的な星もあるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005410_HERMES<tab>Diverse in form and culture. Possessed of unique ways of thinking.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005410_HERMES築いてきた文化は違うだろうし、それどころか、
形状すら異なる知的生命がいるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005420_HERMES<tab>Their conception of life and its purpose will be no exception. Completely and utterly unlike ours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005420_HERMESだとしたら、きっと……
この星で信じられているのとはまったく別の、
命の捉え方をしているのではないかと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005430_METEION<tab>Utterly unlike...how?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005430_METEION<tab>まったく別の、は、どんな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005440_HERMES<tab>I have no idea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005440_HERMES<tab>はは……想像もつかないな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005450_HERMES<tab>Yet whatever answers we receive, I will not dismiss them out of hand. No, I will think earnestly on them all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005450_HERMESけれど、どんな答えが届いたとしても、
頭ごなしに否定したりせず、考えていきたい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005460_HERMES<tab>Then I will share them with our people, that together we may contemplate our own existence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005460_HERMES<tab>みんなに伝えて、弁論をしてもらうのもいいだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005470_HERMES<tab>Perhaps then our star will become a better place─not only for man, but for all life.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005470_HERMESその先で……人だけじゃない……
ひとつでも多くの命が、幸せを知れたらいいと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005480_HERMES<tab>Meteion. Though I gave you wings to soar the heavens, I did not teach you how to walk the earth. So loath was I to bind another living being.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005480_HERMES……メーティオン。
自分は君に翔び方を教えたが、歩き方は……
生命としての生き方は、到底教えられなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005490_HERMES<tab>In the course of your long journey, you will learn from those you meet. Learn to walk and run and so much more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005490_HERMESしかし、永い永い旅の果てに、
君はきっと、それを知る誰かに出会うだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005500_HERMES<tab>And when you return, older and wiser, we will have a celebration to mark your homecoming and coming of age both.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005500_HERMESそうして答えを得て、再びここへ帰ってきたときには……
君を大いに讃え、労おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005510_METEION<tab>Will there be apples? Covered in syrup?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005510_METEION<tab>砂糖、どばどばの、リンゴで……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005520_HERMES<tab>And how are you supposed to eat them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005520_HERMES<tab>君は食べられないじゃないか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005530_HERMES<tab>Hmm... Rather than food... Perhaps...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005530_HERMES<tab>何か形にした方がいいのなら……そうだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005540_HERMES<tab>A flower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005540_HERMES<tab>花を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005550_HERMES<tab>Yes. Upon your return, I will gift you a beautiful flower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005550_HERMES<tab>いつかこの旅をやり遂げた君に、心から花を贈ろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005560_VENAS<tab>So, what is your opinion?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005560_VENAS<tab>……あなたは、どう思いますか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Hermes wouldn't wish for the Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ヘルメスが、望んで終末を起こすはずがない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Hermes is a gentle soul. And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ヘルメスは優しい……でも……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I couldn't say just by this moment alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>これを視ただけじゃわからない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005570_VENAS<tab>I am inclined to agree.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005570_VENAS<tab>ええ、私もそのように感じました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005580_VENAS<tab>As we had suspected, the two are somehow involved. Yet 'tis difficult to believe that they would deliberately seek to end all life.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005580_VENAS依然として、エルピスに終末にまつわる鍵があるとするなら、
ヘルメスとメーティオンの周辺が疑わしい。
けれども、意図的にそれを引き起こすようには思えません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005590_VENAS<tab>I understand. He is a gentle soul, and well intentioned. Yet it does not take ill intent to beget ill.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005590_VENAS……そうですね。
優しくとも、彼の計画が望みどおりの形で進むかどうかは、
また別の話でしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005600_VENAS<tab>We must consider the possibility that something may have gone awry. Perhaps it was oversight...or simply an accident.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005600_VENAS何か意図しない事故や見落としがあって、
終末に繋がる要因を作ってしまう可能性も十分にある……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005610_VENAS<tab>As you say, that was hardly conclusive. Yet based on what we witnessed, I find it difficult to believe that they would deliberately seek to end all life.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005610_VENAS確かに、はっきりとした証拠は掴めていません。
ですが少なくとも、彼らが意図的に終末を起こすことはない……
私はそう感じました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005620_VENAS<tab>Be that as it may, we cannot rule out the possibility that they will play a part in bringing about the Final Days. Perhaps unwittingly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005620_VENASだからといって、終末と無関係とも言い切れませんが。
本人たちのあずかり知らぬところで関与してしまう可能性も、
依然として残っています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005630_VENAS<tab>In light of this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005630_VENAS<tab>……そこで、次の手を提案させてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005640_VENAS<tab>I propose that we reveal your tale to Hermes himself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005640_VENASヘルメスにも、あなたの真実を……
終末のことを話してみるのはどうでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005650_VENAS<tab>If he does not wish for the Final Days, as we believe, he may well join us in pursuing a solution.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005650_VENAS本人に災厄を望む意志がないのであれば、
それを阻止すべく、知恵や力を貸してくれるかもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005660_VENAS<tab>Then it is settled. Let us seek out our friend with all swiftness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005660_VENASそれでは、急いで彼を探さなければいけませんね。
あの優しい人たちが、悲しい宿命に絡めとられてしまう前に。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005670_VENAS<tab>'Twould not do to let such a pure soul be blackened by tragedy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005670_VENAS<tab>ひとまず、もとの島まで戻るとしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005680_HERMES<tab>My apologies for keeping you waiting. I understand there is a matter you wish to discuss.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005680_HERMES待たせてすまない。
十四人委員会の件とは別の、重要な話があると聞いたが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005690_EMETSELCH<tab>Aye, a matter of the utmost gravity...if one can suspend disbelief.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005690_EMETSELCHああ、あるとも。
まさしく信じられないような話がな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005700_EMETSELCH<tab>Go on, then. Tell him what you told us. Who you are and why you came.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005700_EMETSELCH私たちにしたのと同じ話をしてやれ。
お前が何者で、何を求めてここへ来たのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005710_HERMES<tab>The Final Days...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005710_HERMES<tab>……終末の、災厄……そんな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005720_VENAS<tab>The phenomena observed during these star-encompassing calamities is likely the product of a dynamis reaction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005720_VENAS私たちは今のところ、終末の現象の数々は、
デュナミスによって引き起こされているのではと考えています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005730_VENAS<tab>And none is more versed in the applications of this energy than you, Hermes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005730_VENASそして、ここでそれを最も熟知しているのは、
ヘルメス、あなたであろうと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005740_VENAS<tab>I must stress that we do not believe you would desire such destruction. We come not to lodge accusations, but to beg your wisdom.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005740_VENAS一方で、あなたが望んで終末を起こすとは思っていません。
ですので私たちは、糾弾するためではなく、
その知恵をお借りするために来たのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005750_VENAS<tab>And so, distressing though the exercise may be, I ask that you share with us your opinion on the matter─on the assumption that our visitor's tale is true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005750_VENASすぐにすべてを信じるのは難しいかもしれませんが……
この話を真実だとした場合の見解を、
聞かせてはいただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005760_HERMES<tab>Even you, Venat...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005760_HERMES<tab>ヴェーネス様……あなたまで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005770_HERMES<tab>As you say, the phenomena observed in the two calamities may both be attributed to dynamis.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005770_HERMES……確かに、二度の終末は、
いずれもデュナミスが作用したもののように思える。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005780_HERMES<tab>Of note is the difference in its effect. In the first Final Days, it warped creation magicks. In the second, it warped the people themselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005780_HERMES顕著なのは、効果の表れ方だ。
一度目の終末では創造魔法を暴発させ、
再来した終末では、人そのものを変異させている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005790_HERMES<tab>The key variable, I suspect, is the aetheric density of the men of each age.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005790_HERMESこの違いは、両時代の人が有するエーテル量の差によって、
生じているのではないだろうか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005800_HERMES<tab>As you know, aether, in essence, negates dynamis.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005800_HERMES前にも話したとおり、エーテルが少ない方が、
デュナミスと繋がりやすい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005810_HERMES<tab>Harboring high concentrations of aether, we ancients cannot readily manipulate dynamis─nor be manipulated by it. Therefore, rather than our selves, the calamity affected our magicks.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005810_HERMES旧来の人、つまり自分たちは、
大量のエーテルを有しているためデュナミスと繋がりにくい。
そのため身体ではなく、行使する術の方に影響が出た。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005820_HERMES<tab>In contrast, having been sundered, the people of the future are composed of but a fraction of our aether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005820_HERMES一方で未来の人は……
本当に世界が分割されるのであればだが……
分かたれたぶんだけエーテルが薄い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005830_HERMES<tab>Thus are they susceptible to the influence of dynamis─and its transformative potential.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005830_HERMESよってデュナミスの干渉を受けやすく、
自身の変化を引き起こされたと考えられるだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005840_HERMES<tab>But that would explain only the mechanism, not the cause... Though perhaps...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005840_HERMES<tab>ただ、そうなのだとすれば……真に注目すべき点は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005850_EMETSELCH<tab>What is it? Even should it be a hypothesis, we would hear it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005850_EMETSELCH<tab>……憶測でもいい、言ってみろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005860_HERMES<tab>Dynamis is an energy put in motion by feelings. Feelings for which there must first exist a source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005860_HERMES真に注目すべき点は、絶望や恐怖、負の感情によってのみ、
それらの現象が引き起こされているという点だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005870_HERMES<tab>A source to which the victims must be attuned─one that harbors the selfsame negative emotions. Elsewise, it could not be the agent of such extreme change.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005870_HERMESデュナミスは、想いによって作用する力……
だからこそ、作用を「受ける側」と「仕掛ける側」が、
同じ想いを抱いていれば効きやすくなる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005880_VENAS<tab>So it wasn't the stagnation of the celestial currents...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005880_VENAS<tab>つまり、終末は星の循環不全などではない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005890_VENAS<tab>Someone─or something─is instigating the star's demise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005890_VENAS何者かが負の感情によってデュナミスを動かし、
アーテリスを腐らせようとしている……と？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005900_EMETSELCH<tab>So we've a villain on our hands after all... Any idea who or what it could be?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005900_EMETSELCHとんだ不届き者がいたものだな……。
そいつの正体に、心当たりは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005910_HERMES<tab>The celestial currents comprise the outermost layer of the star's aether, encasing it like a protective sphere.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005910_HERMES……終末は、天脈の薄い地域から本格化する。
君は、そう言ったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005920_HERMES<tab>According to your tale, 'twas where the currents were weakest that the phenomena first manifested.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005920_HERMES<tab>天脈は、星のいちばん外側にあるエーテルの流れだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005930_HERMES<tab>If the inciting factor came from without Etheirys, then its effects would first be seen in those locations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005930_HERMESもしも、デュナミスを用いた侵食が、
「星の外」から来ているのなら……
真っ先に食い破られるのは、そこになる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005940_METEION<tab>Greetings. Can you hear me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005940_METEION<tab>こんにちは……聞こえますか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005950_METEION<tab>Do not be alarmed─I mean you no harm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005950_METEION<tab>私は……あなたに敵対する者じゃありません……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005960_METEION<tab>I wish only to hear your words. Share your feelings. Know your thoughts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005960_METEIONあなたの音を聞き……想いを感じ……
考えを……知りたいのです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005970_METEION<tab>May we please...be friends?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005970_METEION<tab>どうか……仲良くしてくれませんか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005980_HERMES<tab>Meteion? What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005980_HERMES<tab>メーティオン、どうしたんだ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005990_METEION<tab>Executing scheduled task. Suspending individual self and connecting to shared consciousness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_005990_METEION時間になりました。
自我をシャットダウンし、共有意識に接続……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006000_METEION<tab>Connection established. Commencing status report.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006000_METEION<tab><var 4A ((姉妹)) ((わたし)) /var>たちからの調査報告をお届けします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006010_METEION<tab>Ah! Ahhh! Ahhhhhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006010_METEION<tab>あ、あ、あ、うあああぁぁ……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006020_METEION<tab>It hurts, it hurts! It hurts!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006020_METEION<tab>痛い……痛いぃ……苦しいよう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006030_METEION<tab>So hot...so cold...so sad... I don't understand... Make it stop... Please, make it stop...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006030_METEIONやめて、熱い……熱い……わかんない……寒いの……。
寒くて痛い……痛くて……悲しい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006040_HERMES<tab>Steady, Meteion! Steady!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006040_HERMES<tab>メーティオン、しっかりするんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006050_METEION<tab>So scared...so lonely... The pain...it's too much...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006050_METEION悲しい……怖いよ……。
さみしい……苦しい……あぁぁ……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006060_METEION<tab>Why...why...why do we...they...hurt...hurt...hate...HATE!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006060_METEIONどして……私たち……こんな……
つらいよ……痛い……憎い……憎い……憎い！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006070_METEION<tab>This is wrong! All wrong!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006070_METEION<tab>違う……こんなの……ダメ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006080_EMETSELCH<tab>She's...gone? But how?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006080_EMETSELCH<tab>っ……離脱した……いや、消えた……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006090_HERMES<tab>She has altered her aetheric density in order to blend in with her surroundings. An ability for avoiding confrontation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006090_HERMES体内のエーテル量を調節して、環境と同化する迷彩だ……！
異星で出会った相手が友好的でなかった場合を想定して、
使えるようにしていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006100_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Most effective...frustratingly so. I can't see her either─not even a trace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006100_HYTHLODAEUS優秀！　でもちょっとマズいね、これは。
ワタシにも視えないよ……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006110_METEION<tab>Stay away. Please. This is wrong. My mistake. So please...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006110_METEIONお願い……来ないで……。
こんなの嘘……私の間違いだよ……だから……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006120_VENAS<tab>Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006120_VENAS<tab>大丈夫ですか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006130_VENAS<tab>...In your mind? No, we only heard her speak the instant before she vanished.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006130_VENASメーティオンの声が？
いえ、私には、姿を消す間際のひとことしか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006140_HERMES<tab>Of course. When communicating without words, Meteion also employs dynamis.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006140_HERMES彼女の、言語に依らずに心を繋げる対話術も、
デュナミスを用いたものなんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006150_HERMES<tab>That would explain why you were able to hear her when we could not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006150_HERMES<tab>自分たちより、君の方が繋がりやすいのかもしれない……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006160_EMETSELCH<tab>Then you are our best chance of finding her. Follow her voice, and try to track her down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006160_EMETSELCH<tab>なら、お前は声を頼りにメーティオンを探せ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006170_EMETSELCH<tab>Hindered though we may be, let us split up and search as well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006170_EMETSELCH私たちも、手分けをして探すぞ。
どこまで肉薄できるかは怪しいものだがな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006180_EMETSELCH<tab>Aha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006180_EMETSELCH<tab>……なるほど、そこか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006190_EMETSELCH<tab>Give chase. We shall herd her into the shelter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006190_EMETSELCHお前はそのままメーティオンを追え！
泉の中央にある東屋に追い込むんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006200_METEION<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006200_METEION<tab>はぁ、はぁ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006210_METEION<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006210_METEION<tab>っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006220_HERMES<tab>Please, Meteion. We must speak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006220_HERMES<tab>……話をさせてくれ、メーティオン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006230_METEION<tab>I'm sorry, Hermes... I'm so sorry...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006230_METEIONああ……ごめんなさい……。
ごめんなさい、ヘルメス……みんな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006240_METEION<tab>If someone can hear these words, then please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006240_METEION<tab>この声が最後に誰かに届くなら……お願い……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006250_METEION<tab>Please...protect them. Protect them all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006250_METEION<tab>みんなを……護って…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006260_METEION<tab>Individual self suspended. Connection with shared consciousness stable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006260_METEION自我のシャットダウン、完了。
共有意識への接続、安定しています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006270_METEION<tab>Our survey is complete. We shall now report our findings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006270_METEIONお待たせしました。
星々の調査が完了したので、ご報告をさしあげます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006280_METEION<tab>All units safely arrived at their respective destinations. Seeking answers to Hermes's question, we attempted to make contact with the intelligent denizens of each star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006280_METEION私たちの全個体が、今回目的としていた星々に到着……
ヘルメスより預かった問いへの回答を求め、
知的生命との接触を試みました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006290_METEION<tab>Results are as follows, in order of numerical code.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006290_METEIONそれぞれの星における結果を、以下、
識別番号順にお伝えします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006300_METEION<tab>Hena: Traces of civilization found─structures believed to have served as domiciles. No extant life-forms detected.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006300_METEION……文明形成の痕跡あり。
住居と思しき建造物はあるものの、現存する生命はなし。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006310_METEION<tab>Dyo: Ruined remnants of buildings scattered across star, surface of which is encased in ice. Presence of life could not be verified.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006310_METEION……大破した建造物の残骸が点在。
地表は氷に覆われ、生命は検知できず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006320_METEION<tab>Tria: Evidence of large population centers akin to cities recovered. No extant life-forms found─only their lingering essence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006320_METEION……都市と呼べる住居集合体が現存。
知的「生命」は存在しないが、
かつてそうであったとする思念体が残留している。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006330_METEION<tab>Tessera: Edifices surmised to be abandoned residences found. No extant life-forms detected. Deadly plague or extreme environmental degradation likely to have led to mass extinction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006330_METEION……こちらも住居と思しき建造物あり、現存生命はなし。
疫病ないし汚染が死滅の原因と推定される……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006340_HERMES<tab>They are all...dead?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006340_HERMES<tab>そんな……生きている者は、誰もいないのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006350_METEION<tab>Okto: Star found in state of violent conflict. Contact successfully made with inhabitants, but deployment of weapons of mass destruction resulted in total annihilation of local population shortly thereafter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006350_METEION……全土で大規模な戦闘中。
住民との接触を果たすが、彼らは間もなく破壊兵器により全滅。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006360_METEION<tab>Ennea: Star is a barren desert. No identifiable flora found. Bones of living beings resembling men discovered beneath sands, but determination regarding their intelligence inconclusive.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006360_METEION……一面の砂漠、植物に類する生命も発見できず。
砂の中に、比較的アーテリスの人に近い形状の骨が多数存在。
知的生命であったかは判断不能……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006370_EMETSELCH<tab>Remind me, Hermes. What exactly was the question you entrusted to Meteion?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006370_EMETSELCHおい、ヘルメス……。
改めて聞くが、お前がメーティオンに託した問いは何だった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006380_HERMES<tab>I tasked her with asking what others live for. What gives their lives...meaning...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006380_HERMES<tab>生きる理由を……命の意味を、どう考えるかと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006390_EMETSELCH<tab>Did you consider what may happen if the premise of the question is flawed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006390_EMETSELCH<tab>では、その問いの前提が間違っていたらどうなる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006400_EMETSELCH<tab>To be able to answer it, one must be living─and desire to continue doing so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006400_EMETSELCH生きる理由も、命の意味も、生きていればこそ……
それを望んでいてこそ答えられるものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006410_EMETSELCH<tab>But if Meteion finds no living beings in the course of her journey...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006410_EMETSELCHもし、メーティオンがどれだけ翔んでも、
生きている者がいなかったら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006420_EMETSELCH<tab>Or none who desire to live, what then?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006420_EMETSELCH生きたいなどと望んでいる者が、
誰ひとりとしていなかったとしたら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006430_EMETSELCH<tab>What answers would she derive from their silence?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006430_EMETSELCH<tab>……そいつはこの星に、どんな答えを持ち帰ってくる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006440_HERMES<tab>No subtitles, reported if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006440_HERMES<tab>ッ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006450_VENAS<tab>Meteion, enough. Suspend your mission and return hither at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006450_VENASメーティオン、もうおやめなさい。
探索をすぐに中断して、全員帰還するのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006460_METEION<tab>Deka-pente: Local civilization once flourished under auspices of higher power. Said power later laid waste to civilization in fit of rage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006460_METEION……
特定の個体を神子と呼称し、文化の中核としていた。
しかし、その神子の暴動によって全滅。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006470_METEION<tab>Upon revealing this to me, entity elected to self-terminate in lieu of providing answer to question. No other intelligent life-forms found.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006470_METEION私にそれを語った神子本人も、
問いを提示したところ、回答と称して自害……知的生命消失。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006480_EMETSELCH<tab>Turning a deaf ear, are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006480_EMETSELCH<tab>チッ、聞く耳を持たずか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006490_EMETSELCH<tab>We are taking Meteion back to Amaurot. As I understand, we will need her if we are to bring back all of her sisters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006490_EMETSELCHメーティオンを、アーモロートに連れていくぞ。
こいつを足掛かりとして、
一連の個体を回収する手立てを考える必要がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006500_HERMES<tab>Y-Yes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006500_HERMES<tab>あ、ああ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006510_HERMES<tab>Meteion...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006510_HERMES<tab>メーティオン……自分は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006520_HERMES<tab>It isn't right, is it? It isn't right to turn away from the answer...even if the answer...is pain...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006520_HERMES<tab>自分は、君が今直面している答えを、切り捨てていいのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006530_HERMES<tab>Even if we aberrations must scream ourselves hoarse to be heard...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006530_HERMES切り捨てられても仕方のない想いを、
それでも聞いてほしいと願っていたのは……誰だった……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006540_HERMES<tab>Aye. Whatever answers we find, I will not dismiss them out of hand. These words I said to you...and I will hold myself to them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006540_HERMES……ああ。
どんな答えが届いたとしても、頭ごなしに否定したりしない。
そう言ったのは、確かに自分だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006550_EMETSELCH<tab>What is the meaning of this!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006550_EMETSELCH<tab>何のつもりだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006560_HERMES<tab>You cannot take Meteion. Not until she has finished her report.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006560_HERMESメーティオンは、まだ連れて行かせない。
彼女の報告は、終わっていないのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006570_HERMES<tab>All else must wait.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006570_HERMESすべてを聞いて、どうするかを決めるのはそのあとだ。
悪いが、邪魔をしないでくれ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006580_EMETSELCH<tab>You fool!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006580_EMETSELCH<tab>大馬鹿者め……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006590_HERMES<tab>So, it comes to this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006590_HERMES<tab>とうとう  ここまで来てしまったか

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006600_HERMES<tab>I've no wish to fight. But this time, I cannot yield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006600_HERMES<tab>だが  自分も  今回だけは退くわけにいかない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006610_HERMES<tab>Though the world may think me a mad, desperate fool, I will hold fast to my conviction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006610_HERMES世界中に愚か者と言われても
この意志を 貫いてみせる――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006620_HERMES<tab>No... My power...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006620_HERMES<tab>力が――転身が保てない――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006630_EMETSELCH<tab>It's over, Hermes. In the name of the Convocation, I hereby take Meteion into custody.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006630_EMETSELCH……時間だ、ヘルメス。
メーティオンの身柄は、十四人委員会が預からせてもらう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006640_EMETSELCH<tab>And setting aside the matter of your nomination, you will come with us, too. We require your knowledge to assess and resolve the situation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006640_EMETSELCHそれから、ファダニエルへの推挙の話をどうするにせよ、
お前にも来てもらうぞ。
状況を見極めるには、その知識が必要だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006650_HERMES<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006650_HERMES<tab>ぐっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006660_HERMES<tab>Meteion... I'm so sorry... Would that I could have listened to your report in full...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006660_HERMESメーティオン……。
できることなら、君の報告をゆっくり聞きたかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006670_HERMES<tab>Reflected upon its meaning and conveyed it to others─that they might reconsider their chosen course...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006670_HERMESその意味を考え、しかるべき言葉で伝え、
みんなに己の行いを問い直してほしかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006680_HERMES<tab>But I have failed, and that wish will never be realized. However...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006680_HERMES自分が力及ばぬばかりに、その機会は失われようとしている。
だが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006690_HERMES<tab>Ere our fates become the province of others, I bid you tell me...just one thing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006690_HERMES君と自分の命運が、他人に委ねられてしまう前に、
せめてこれだけは聞かせてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006700_HERMES<tab>Was there happiness in those distant stars?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006700_HERMES<tab>彼方の星に、幸せは……命の意味は……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006710_HERMES<tab>Was there a reason for living?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006710_HERMES<tab>生きる歓びは、あったのだろうか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006720_METEION<tab>We conducted our search as per your instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006720_METEION<tab>……私たちは、言いつけどおりに探しました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006730_METEION<tab>We scoured historical records. Communed with the spirits of the deceased.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006730_METEIONあるときは遺された記録から。
またあるときは、死して漂う思念体から。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006740_METEION<tab>Heard the final testaments of the dying. Welcomed their shadowed hearts into our own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006740_METEIONときには絶命間際の遺言を聞き、
知的生命たちの想いを、心で受け止めてきたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006750_METEION<tab>One race had striven to create a world bereft of animosity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006750_METEION<tab>ある生命は、親愛にあふれる世界を目指していました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006760_METEION<tab>They renounced relationships to avoid interpersonal strife, and in so doing brought about societal collapse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006760_METEIONしかし、傷つけあわないための断絶……
すなわち孤独に蝕まれ、壊れていきました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006770_METEION<tab>One race had renounced war and devoted itself to the enrichment of its people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006770_METEION<tab>ある生命は、より良き暮らしを求めて発展に勤しみました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006780_METEION<tab>They were conquered. Though they destroyed the enemy in reprisal, they could not regain their former glory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006780_METEION……ゆえに襲われ、略奪された。
報復で相手を滅ぼしましたが、彼らもすでに再起不能でした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006790_METEION<tab>One race had concluded that finite time was the root of all woes. Aspiring to shatter its shackles, they went in search of infinity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006790_METEIONある生命は、悲劇の根源は有限な時間にあると考え、
時間からの脱却を……無限を探し求めました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006800_METEION<tab>They discovered nothing is infinite, and that neither time or death can be cheated. Disillusioned, they gave up on the future─and themselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006800_METEION結果わかったのは、宇宙でさえも有限であり、
終わりからは逃げられないという事実。
彼らは未来とともに、生きる理由を失いました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006810_METEION<tab>One race had discarded all things that gave rise to sorrow, hoping to have only joy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006810_METEIONある生命は、怒りや悲しみを呼び起こすもの、
その一切を捨て去りました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006820_METEION<tab>They found joy lost its savor in the absence of sorrow, and lost their will to live.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006820_METEION同時に歓びも薄れ、生に意味はなくなり、
静かなる自滅がはじまりました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006830_METEION<tab>Though worlds apart, these peoples shared a belief. The belief that they had tried their best.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006830_METEION誰もが声で、心で、歴史で訴えていました。
一生懸命に生きたのだと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006840_METEION<tab>That they had tried to fulfill their potential, with every step and success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006840_METEION<tab>最善を目指して、精一杯歩んできたのだと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006850_METEION<tab>In the course of which they learned the truth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006850_METEION<tab>……その上で、彼らは思い知ったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006860_METEION<tab>That they would never be free of fear and sorrow, anger and despair─of loneliness─so long as they yet lived.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006860_METEION絶望は、悲しみは、怒りは、孤独は、恐怖は、諦めは、
決してなくすことなどできないのだと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006870_METEION<tab>Even now, their souls cry out for oblivion. And to this song of anguish, I lend my voice. We lend our voice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006870_METEIONゆえに私は、わたしとワタシ、私たちは……
この心に溶けあった、すべての先ゆく者たちは、終わりを謳う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006880_METEION<tab>O beloved mankind, shimmering jewels of beautiful Etheirys... Rejoice, for we will free you from the cruel yoke of existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006880_METEION恋しい人、美しいアーテリスの輝ける命たち。
苦しいくせに意味のない、生の軛から解き放ってあげる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006890_METEION<tab>There is no need to struggle in vain, for in nihility awaits salvation. You will know peace and serenity...and it will be beautiful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006890_METEION何にもならないんですもの、何もしなくっていいでしょう？
終わりは合理的で美しい……乱れ得ぬ静穏、唯一の安らぎよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006900_METEION<tab>We will make our nest at the edge of the universe, and there in the dark of dead worlds hoard sorrow and suffering.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006900_METEIONさあ……天の果てに巣をつくり、
星という星から死と終焉を集めましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006910_METEION<tab>There we will sing, our chorus ever louder and ever clearer, that our song may reach even this aether-shrouded star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006910_METEIONそうしてもっとうまく、強く謳うの。
エーテルで覆われたこの星にも、ちゃんと終わりが届くように。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006920_METEION<tab>Such is the answer we have found in the stars. Such is the gift we now offer to Etheirys.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006920_METEIONそれが答え。
天つ星々からアーテリスの命に贈る、結論よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006930_EMETSELCH<tab>Who are you to decide our fate? To decree we live or die?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006930_EMETSELCHふざけるな……！
私たちの終わりを、勝手に決めることは許さない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006940_EMETSELCH<tab>Have you lost your mind!? You heard what she said! She means to destroy us all, yet you'd still take her side!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006940_EMETSELCH何のつもりだ……！
今の話を聞いてなお、そちらに味方するつもりか！？
そいつが終末を起こそうとしているんだぞ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006950_HERMES<tab>In the name of the star, we have discarded those creations that we deemed flawed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006950_HERMES……自分たちは、星を善くするために、
基準に見合わなかった生命を屠ってきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006960_HERMES<tab>If we ourselves are flawed, does it not stand to reason that we too should be discarded?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006960_HERMESそれは、終わることこそ救いだと信じて、
私たちを屠るのと、どう違うのだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006970_EMETSELCH<tab>That is sophistry and you know it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006970_EMETSELCH<tab>そんなものは詭弁だ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006980_HERMES<tab>Perhaps it is. Perhaps I am wrong. But who is to say that you are right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006980_HERMESああ、そうだな。
自分はきっと正しくない。
だが、君たちも正しくはないよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006990_HERMES<tab>Let us settle this with a determination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_006990_HERMES<tab>だから、測らなければならないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007000_HERMES<tab>In my authority as chief overseer of Elpis, I will make a judgment on man's fitness to exist.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007000_HERMESここはエルピス、生命の実験場……
所長ヘルメスの名において、「人」の裁定を執り行おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007010_HERMES<tab>If he can learn to value all life and retain his will to live, even should his end be justified, he will surely find a way to avert his demise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007010_HERMES人がもし、命を見つめ直し、生きたいと渇望したなら……
それに足るだけのものであるならば、
いかに真理であると謳おうが、終わりは退けられるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007020_HERMES<tab>If not, he will perish from the star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007020_HERMES<tab>そうでなければ、星ごと滅びるのみ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007030_HERMES<tab>As with all determinations, provisions must be made to ensure fairness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007030_HERMES<tab>そして、裁定である以上は、公正を期さなければならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007040_HERMES<tab>Kairos! Awaken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007040_HERMES<tab>起動せよ……カイロス！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007050_KAIROS<tab>(-Kairos-)Memory reconfiguration system Kairos activated. Awaiting instruction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007050_KAIROS(-カイロス-)記憶改変機構、カイロス、起動。
主よ、用件を承りましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007060_HERMES<tab>Command: universal memory alteration. Target area: Ktisis Hyperboreia.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007060_HERMESヒュペルボレア造物院全域を対象に、
記憶の消去と変更を行う……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007070_HERMES<tab>Starting point: arrival of Emet-Selch of the Convocation at Propylaion. End point: the present.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007070_HERMES起点は、プロピュライオンに、
十四人委員会エメトセルクが到着した瞬間とする。
以降、現在に至るまでの記憶を消去……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007080_HERMES<tab>Erase the memories of all events, and replace with a vague recollection of the following:
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007080_HERMES同時に、以下の情報を、
辛うじて思い出せる程度に焼き込んでくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007090_HERMES<tab>I was here, preparing to demonstrate the functionality of Kairos to Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007090_HERMES……自分はここで、エメトセルクとヒュトロダエウスに、
日ごろ研究に用いているカイロスを見せようとした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007100_HERMES<tab>Meteion's shared consciousness became unstable. She and her sisters could not sustain their existence, and all dissipated with a burst.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007100_HERMESしかし、折悪くメーティオンの共有意識が暴走。
存在を維持できなくなった彼女は、
宇宙にいる者も含め、すべてが弾けて消え去った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007110_HERMES<tab>The resultant shockwave accidentally triggered Kairos, which erased several days of memories from all present. Execute.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007110_HERMESその際の衝撃でカイロスが誤作動……
自分たちも含め、館内にいた者の数日分の記憶を焼き消した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007120_KAIROS<tab>(-Kairos-)Command acknowledged. Initializing... Three processes remaining to execution.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007120_KAIROS(-カイロス-)承知いたしました。
作動準備……3プロセス中、第1プロセスを開始します……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007130_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Bravo. I daresay one would be hard-pressed to make it fairer...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007130_HYTHLODAEUSさすがだね。
それだけまっさらにしてくれたら、確かに公正だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007140_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Everything that you told us, everything that has happened─the fact we've even met... It will all be gone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007140_HYTHLODAEUSキミに出会ったことも、教えてもらった未来の話も、
メーティオンが変わり果てたって事実さえ、
消えてなくなるんだから……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007150_HERMES<tab>Go, Meteion. To the edge of the universe, where none can reach you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007150_HERMES行くんだ、メーティオン。
誰の手も届かない、天の果てまで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007160_METEION<tab>Hermes. Won't you come with me? If you were to shed your flesh, I should be able to carry you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007160_METEIONあなたも連れて行きましょうか、ヘルメス。
血肉を棄ててくれるならば、きっと運べるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007165_HERMES<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007165_HERMES<tab>フ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007170_HERMES<tab>I will remain. As a man, I will oppose the oblivion you bring.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007170_HERMES<tab>……自分は最後まで人として、君のもたらす終わりに抗おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007180_METEION<tab>Silly fool... Had you said yes, I would've granted you the gentlest end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007180_METEION馬鹿な人……。
頷いてくれたら、いちばん優しく終わりにしてあげたのに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007190_VENAS<tab>This ends here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007190_VENAS<tab>行かせは……しません……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007200_HERMES<tab>Fly, Meteion!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007200_HERMES<tab>さあ、翔べッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007210_HERMES<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007210_HERMES<tab>っ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007220_EMETSELCH<tab>That is far enough, Hermes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007220_EMETSELCH<tab>お前の相手は私だ、ヘルメスッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007230_VENAS<tab>Argos, to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007230_VENAS<tab>来て、アルゴス！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007235_VENAS<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007235_VENAS<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007240_KAIROS<tab>(-Kairos-)First process complete. Two remaining to execution of memory reconfiguration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007240_KAIROS(-カイロス-)記憶改変作動準備、第1プロセス完了。
第2プロセスに移行します……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007250_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>As if we needed more pressure...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007250_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>焦らせてくれるなぁ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007260_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>No matter what, you cannot forget what happened today. For it is the key to saving your future─your world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007260_HYTHLODAEUSいいかい、キミは絶対に今日のことを忘れちゃダメだ。
ここで知ったことは、未来を救うための鍵でもあるんだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007270_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>This fight is our fight; what comes after, our problem to contend with. Not yours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007270_HYTHLODAEUS極論、ここでメーティオンやワタシたちがどうなろうが、
それはあくまでこちらの歴史……ワタシたちの戦いだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007280_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>No, your own struggle awaits. And no one else can take your place.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007280_HYTHLODAEUSそして、キミにはキミの戦いが待っている……。
ほかの誰も、代わりはできないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007290_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>You must flee this place with your memories intact─and I will see that you do!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007290_HYTHLODAEUSだからとにかく脱出が優先！
わかったらワタシにお任せあれだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007300_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Now then, where is it...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007300_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>さあ、どこにある……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007310_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>There you are, my little confluence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007310_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>あった、空間の繋ぎ目だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007320_VENAS<tab>Almost...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007320_VENAS<tab>あと少し……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007330_VENAS<tab>No subtitles, report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007330_VENAS<tab>くっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007340_VENAS<tab>Very well, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007340_VENAS<tab>だったら、これを……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007350_VENAS<tab>You may elude us this day, but not forever!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007350_VENAS<tab>天の果てであろうと、私たちは、必ず……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007360_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Meteion's gotten away...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007360_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>メーティオンが逃げたのか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007370_KAIROS<tab>(-Kairos-)Second process complete. One remaining to execution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007370_KAIROS<tab>(-カイロス-)第2プロセス完了、最終プロセスに移行します……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007380_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>No time for brooding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007380_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>っと、悔しがってる場合じゃないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007390_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Listen well. Beyond lies a spatial confluence that connects the interior sections of this building.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06004_007390_HYTHLODAEUSいいかい、造物院の内部を形成する複数の空間、
その繋ぎ目がこの先にあるんだ。
